text: Sagaŋ 23.26 Mt 27.32, Mk 15.21 hɨsɨŋ hulemɨlɨ agɨlaŋ Jisasɨ dɨ via uavɨdaci hulaŋ mu Saimon Sailini haiabɨla hɨsɨŋ agaŋ Jelusalem haiabɨla ivo ivo saŋ vemi. Ve nulɨdɨ likilamɨben aba lɨci mɨŋalɨvavɨmi. Mɨŋalɨvavɨla kɨlɨ cɨkaŋ hɨlihua lamavɨla Jisasɨ dɨ lama henaŋ hɨvɨ ifɨci uu hɨsɨŋ agadɨ nusaŋ iguavɨci havavɨla Jisasɨ dɨ sɨvɨ umi.
